title: New free champion rotation: Caitlyn, Kled, Lissandra and more!

replies.body:
#A Corporate Matter
**Episode: _I was not prepared!_**

{{champion:150}} "And done. All finished up and ready to go home right on time."

{{champion:16}} "Awfully slow day today."

{{champion:150}} "Well, it is a Friday."

{{champion:16}} "That it is. So, you ready for the eclipse on Monday?"

{{champion:150}} "No, the eclipse is just a hoax set up by corporations like us to sell glasses and hotel tickets."

{{champion:16}} "Really? What a bummer."

 {{champion:150}} "No, you haven't been on Runeterra long enough to know this. But trust me, you don't want to see how the people react when there's an eclipse."

{{champion:16}} "I guess you're right. Well, see you next week."

{{champion:150}} "Let me just grab my-"
_"Knocks over figure."_

{{champion:150}} "Awww, dammit."

{{champion:16}} "What happened?"

{{champion:150}} "Nothing, I just knocked over my Warring Kingdoms Azir Figure on the button that posts the New free champion rotation post. Guess people get to find out a bit early this week."

{{champion:16}} "Think anyone will be upset."

{{champion:150}} "Probably not, it's got Kled on it. Except maybe that one weird guy that writes about us."

**_"King Dellron slowly cries in a corner as his whole plan for Monday is ruined."_**

what that was so early

its not monday its friday. Oh hey kled is here lol{{champion:240}}
Whats with the early free champ rotation? are ya'll always gunna do it on sat now or twice a week like the sales? or is this just temporary?

And for the past how many years they would announce Monday, go live Tuesday, but the last week it went live Monday.
Go home rito, you're drunk.
There. Kled is free this week. Happy now?
The meme is dead! {{champion:240}} is finally free!
yay kennen and kled, but why ashe and garen? and why did they announce the rotation so early?
Probably becuase the rotation now hits on monday instead of tuesday

so today be monday and the free rotation didn't change so that means A. this is a mistake or B. last week's rotation came in too early but still this means they put up the free rotation post 4 days early rito the heck
I would like that rakan and xayah comeback to the free champion rotation

Hmmm, now that Taliyah and Kled have finally made return appearances...
Top 3 longest since last free:
Ivern - 19 weeks
Camille - 18 weeks
Cho'Gath - 18 weeks
(and, as always, honorable mention to Alistar and Tristana)

6 top laners and 1 mid laner gj rito
(Actually really excited for kled xd)

I think Jayce is the other mid.
I would say Zilean/Zyra, but those are the only 'obvious' supports.
{{champion:240}} {{champion:240}} {{champion:240}}
Dear Riot i seem to notices the free to play champs seem to show up a lot during Arurf can you please fix this? its getting stale rerolling and getting these champs every other time.

Best build for kled: Black cleaver> Titanic hydra> Gargoils(pop when dsmounted)
(Yoummus if behind)(duskblade for advanced users)>frozen mallet> ninja tabis. HIGHLY gold effecient, good in team fights, easy remounts used by best kleds NA and can bust a adc from 100 to 0 in 2 and 1/2 seconds or less. HAVE FUN!

Win elo and KLEEEEEEED!
{{champion:240}}
Yes Kled! I have been wanting to try him but have been saving up for the chroma sales that are hopefully coming soon!
Ooh. I always wanted to try Zyra!
Last time riot was this early, they weren't
I'm happy I get to try Vi before I get her. I hope she's as fun to play as she looks.

Standard Vi combo:
Q> slam into them
Wait for Auto-punch
E> big punch
It lets you trigger the W as fast as possible.
{{item:3147}} op and I wish i could have played {{champion:245}}  :(
ekko is still in the rotation
This free isn't live (yet), so there's still time.

She had no chance against 5 of us.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
You forgot to say that you went over to help.

yey early
